headline: Can Albemarle’s (ALB) Asset Sales Shift Its Fortunes in a Volatile Lithium Market?
summary: In its recent third-quarter earnings announcement, Albemarle Corporation reported sales of US$1,307.83 million and a net loss of US$160.69 million, alongside a goodwill impairment charge of US$181.07 million for the period ended September 30, 2025. The company highlighted a 7% increase in adjusted EBITDA and plans for asset divestitures expected to generate US$660 million in pre-tax cash proceeds, reflecting ongoing efforts to bolster efficiency and financial flexibility despite lower...
